name: replex
description: REsource PLanning and EXecution monitoring tool

scripts.db:mysql-init: echo Create my.ini for windows with local MySQL server location and credentials
scripts.db:set-credentials: echo Set credentials in an untracked file
scripts.dolt:get-db: echo Clone dolt-managed db from dolthub
scripts.dolt:start: systemctl status mysql && mysql --version && dolt sql-server -P 3307

author: Oleksii Rudenko
